manageExperience: Manage your shopping experience at Diaflower Online Store.
noOrders: You have not previously ordered as a registered customer.
noAddresses: You have not saved any addresses yet.
ordersPageIntro: View and manage your order history. Track the status of your recent purchases and review past orders.
errorLoadingOrders: Error loading orders. Please try again.

confirmDeleteAddress: Are you sure you want to delete this address?
addressCreateDescription: Your new address has been successfully added.
addressUpdateDescription: Your address has been successfully updated.
addressDeleteDescription: Your address has been successfully deleted.
addressActionError: Failed to {action} address. Please try again.
title: Title
profilePageIntro: Manage your personal information and preferences. Keep your profile up to date to ensure the best experience.
errorLoadingProfile: Error loading profile. Please try again.
newsletterSubscription: I would like to receive marketing information about our products or services.
newsletterDescription: We may send you this information using e-mail, text, telephone or post. We may also use your information to deliver personalized messages or advertising on social media or other digital platforms. You can ask us to stop marketing at any time.

profileUpdateError: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
